title: Marrikas Egyptian Cotton 6 Piece Towel Set Burgundy
features: 6 PC. set includes (2) 30x56 bath towels, (2) 16x30 hand towels and (2) 13x13 wash cloths
description: 6 Piece Set Color BURGUNDY. Wonderfully soft and absorbent 100% Egyptian cotton in 600 gram weight. Lovely braid detailing. Egyptian cotton offers enhanced softness with each washing. (2) 30x56 bath towels, (2) 16x30 hand towels and (2) 13x13 wash cloths. Coordinating separate pieces and bath sheets also available.
